17
How do we express concepts?
• In natural language :
– Terms (one-word or multi-word  units) that denote or refer to a concept in a 
subject field 
– Definitions 
– Glosses, etc.
• In artificial language 
– Codes
– Formulas
• In a multimedia resource:
– Icons
– Photos
– Diagrams
– Graphs
– Video-clips
– Audio-clips
– Other multimedia representations
